- - All right.

You know I love it when you dance with me.

- Antonio. - Hi.

Kids.

is not that.

ninety- eight,

Tony.

translation.en: Complete the challenge to gain access.
It's asking if we're one or two players. This has to be a trick.
translation.es: Pregunta por uno o dos jugadores. Debe ser un truco.

translation.en: - This is Hyskor. Let's beat it. - Why don't we just tap through?
translation.es: Es Hyskor. Vamos a ganarle. - Presionaré. - No. Quizá sea un dilema.

translation.en: No, no. Could be a red wire- blue wire situation.
translation.es: - Presionaré. - No. Quizá sea un dilema.

translation.en: - Seriously? - Yes, seriously!
Done.
Patty, get to the safe house. There's something inside I need you to protect.
translation.es: Vayan al refugio. Hay allí algo que deben proteger.

translation.en: - How do I find it? - It'll find you.
translation.es: ¿Cómo lo encuentro? Te encontrará. Protégelo hasta que lleguemos.

translation.en: Just keep it safe till we get there.
translation.es: Te encontrará. Protégelo hasta que lleguemos.

translation.en: Wear this tracker so that we can locate you. Syncing.
translation.es: Con este rastreador los localizaremos. Sincronizando.

translation.en: Stay safe,
and don't trust anybody.
- We don't wanna go without you! - You'll be safe. See you later.
Babe!
Mom!
Dad!
- No! - Kids!
- No! - Tony. Tony!
No! Stay away from them!
Mom! Dad!
No!
You're a much better driver than Dad.
I'm not driving!
Bad guys up ahead!
They're chasing after us!
- Tell this thing to go faster! - Go faster!
They're up to something!
They're hacking our autopilot.
It's driving us to where the bad guys want us to go.
translation.es: Nos lleva adonde los malos quieren que vayamos.

translation.en: We gotta go manual and get to the safe house ourselves.
translation.es: Debemos cambiar a manual e ir al refugio.

translation.en: - Keep it on the road! - Whoa, check this out.
The anti- crash bounces us right off obstacles.
translation.es: El antichoque nos hace rebotar contra los obstáculos.

translation.en: This thing controls just like that game Mecha Wings.
translation.es: Se controla como el juego Mecha Wings.

translation.en: Give me that.
I'm the best at Mecha Wings.
translation.es: Sé jugar bien al Mecha Wings.

translation.en: You're going too fast!
- He's got us! - Oh yeah?
We gotta lose them, or they'll follow us to the safe house.
translation.es: Debemos perderlos o nos seguirán al refugio.

translation.en: - Look out! -
How about some of this?
You're going right into them!
- That's the idea. - What?!
Just like Mecha Wings.
Turn there.
You're going the wrong way.
That was kind of impressive, Patty.
Thank you.
Now let's just hope this safe house is actually safe.
translation.es: Ahora, esperemos que el refugio sí nos refugie.

translation.en: Wait a second.
I'm about to be really smart.
I think Mom and Dad
are spies.
You think?
We did something wrong.
This can't be it.
So Mom and Dad are spies, and they sent us to the middle of nowhere?
translation.es: ¿Mamá y papá son espías y nos enviaron al medio de la nada?

translation.en: - This must be a joke. - Then why am I not laughing?
translation.es: - Debe ser broma. - Pero no me río.

translation.en: The water is so nice… and brown.
translation.es: El agua es tan agradable y marrón.

translation.en: Maybe we jump in.
After you.
Your name?
Uh, Patty Torrez.
Tony Torrez.
Your full name, please.
Uh, Patty Tango- Torrez?
My dad's last name is Tango, and my mom's is Torrez.
translation.es: Mi papá se apellida Tango y mi mamá es Torrez.

translation.en: - Your full name. - We never use our full names.
translation.es: - Su nombres completos. - No los usamos.

translation.en: They're too long.
Your full name, please.
Patricia Angelita Sorrow Feliz Rhiannon Tango- Torrez.
translation.es: Patricia Angelita Sorrow Feliz Rhiannon Tango-Torrez.

translation.en: Antonio Joaquin Cecilio Rogue Amadeus Tango- Torrez.
translation.es: Antonio Joaquín Cecilio Rogue Amadeus Tango-Torrez.

translation.en: - - The safe house is underwater?  Either that or it drowned.
translation.es: - ¿El refugio está bajo el agua? - Eso o se ahogó.

translation.en: It's empty.
This place is a dump.
- - Hey, kiddos.
We couldn't wait to show you the safe house when you were old enough.
If you're here now and by yourselves,
that means something has gone terribly wrong.
translation.es: significa que algo salió muy mal.

translation.en: But don't you worry. Mom and Dad are very close.
translation.es: No se preocupen. Mamá y papá están cerca.

translation.en: And if you haven't guessed yet,
translation.es: Y si aún no lo adivinaron,

translation.en: your father and I are spies.
translation.es: su padre y yo somos espías.

translation.en: Hopefully, we will see you soon so we can explain everything.
translation.es: Ojalá los veamos pronto para poder explicarles.

translation.en: In the meantime,
choose your activity.
There's comfort for sleep…
- Cozy beds! - I get the top bunk.
…food for nourishment…
A little kitchen and snacks.
…gadget tutorials for a competitive edge…
Spy gadgets!
This place is amazing!
…and spy training modules for self- defense.
translation.es: Y entrenamiento de espionaje para defensa personal.

translation.en: - Stand here. - Spy training!
- I'm gonna be the best spy ever. -
Tony!
Hello.
- Move over. I'm coming down. - Lesson one complete.
translation.es: Muévete. Voy a bajar. Lección uno completada. Cuidado con las trampas.

translation.en: Always look out for traps.
translation.es: Lección uno completada. Cuidado con las trampas.

translation.en: Look at this place.
Lesson two, ambush.
Ambush Alley.
This is easy.
Just like a video game.
Hee- hee. You did it!
Almost good.
I'm gonna try this one.
Avoid the lasers or you'll trip the alarm.
translation.es: Evita los láseres o dispararás la alarma.

translation.en: Okay. Your turn.
- - Failure!
Please try again.
Failure.
How come when you mess up, I get hit?
translation.es: Tú te equivocas y me golpean a mí.

translation.en: Um… because we're a team?
Let me try.
Failure.
Smart training system.
- Let's go upstairs and do gadgets. - Okay.
- Let's find a way out. -
Oh, did they hurt you, my love?
No. No, no, no. They didn't.
The sleeper kiss is what leaves the lingering pain.
translation.es: El beso del sueño causa el dolor persistente.

translation.en: I had to delete it.
- I know. - Okay. Then let's break outta here.
translation.es: - Ya sé. - Bien. Salgamos de aquí.

translation.en: - Oh. - I'm gonna say that's a trap.
At least we get to meet whoever's behind this. Come on.
translation.es: Pero conoceremos al que hizo esto.

translation.en: - So you're just gonna-- - Come on!
I'm sure they're gonna let us waltz right into where they are.
translation.es: Nos dejarán ir tranquilamente adonde están.

translation.en: This is why we get in trouble.
- You're impulsive. - Just stay close.
I am just asking you to use a little caution.
Stay close.
Come on.
- Hear that? - Yeah.
One, two, three.
- That's ominous. - Yeah.
- Very interesting. - Uh- huh.
Hi.
Uh, excuse our appearance. We didn't realize it was Fantasy Friday here.
translation.es: Perdón por el vestuario. No teníamos disfraces.

translation.en: Nice architecture, by the way. Very, uh… retro video gamey.
translation.es: Bonita arquitectura. Del estilo videojuego retro.

translation.en: As far as I'm concerned,
translation.es: En lo que a mí respecta,

translation.en: the late 20th century was the height
translation.es: el final del siglo XX fue el apogeo de la tecnología visual.

translation.en: of visual technology.
translation.es: fue el apogeo de la tecnología visual.

translation.en: It was all downhill from there.
Please sit down.
Oh, there…
Trust me.
So, Rey Kingston,
one of the most powerful tech giants in all of history,
translation.es: uno de los gigantes tecnológicos más poderosos de la historia,

translation.en: using a virus to force everyone to play video games. Why?
translation.es: usa un virus para obligarnos a jugar videojuegos. ¿Por qué?

translation.en: Well, the only true benefit in gaining power is to influence the world.
translation.es: El único beneficio de tener poder es influir en el mundo.

translation.en: There's no better way to do that than through your Armageddon Code.
translation.es: El mejor modo de hacerlo es su Código Armagedón.

translation.en: And you shut off half the world with it. Happy?
No, I'm not.
Yeah, Armageddon was supposed to allow Hyskor to break into every device on the planet.
translation.es: Armagedón debía permitirle Hyskor entrar a cada dispositivo del planeta.

translation.en: So why has it stopped halfway?
translation.es: ¿Por qué se detuvo a la mitad?

translation.en: - Try turning it off and back on? - That works.
Maybe just give it a smack.
Take it out…  …right back in.
- You're not gonna help me fix it, are you? - Not a chance.
translation.es: - No me ayudarán a arreglarlo. - Claro que no.

translation.en: There's other ways.
For the longest time, I've wanted to challenge both of you to a duel.
translation.es: Durante mucho tiempo, he querido desafiarlos a duelo.

translation.en: - Why us? - I mean, are we that good?
No.
You're not good at all.
If you win, you go free.
If I win, you fix the code.
translation.es: Si yo gano, arreglan el código.

translation.en: Let's do this.
Sorry.
Babe!
The code I stole was complete.
translation.es: El código que robé estaba completo.

translation.en: You must have split it the moment I took it from your home.
translation.es: Deben haberlo dividido cuando lo saqué de su casa.

translation.en: Babe!
Failsafe mechanism, huh? To ensure it doesn't fall into the wrong hands?
translation.es: ¿Un mecanismo de seguridad para que no caiga en manos equivocadas?

translation.en: Wear this tracker so that we can locate you.
So if her necklace is a tracker…
translation.es: Si su collar es un rastreador,

translation.en: Your kids have the missing piece, don't they?
translation.es: sus hijos tienen la pieza que falta.

translation.en: Stay away from my kids!
- Careful! -
Is this all just a game to you?
translation.es: Es solo un juego para ti.

translation.en: It is.
And with game theory, anything can be fixed, even this sorry world.
translation.es: Con la teoría de juegos, todo se arregla, incluso este mundo lamentable.

translation.en: Maybe your children will be a little more helpful than you.
Let's find out.
I get the top bunk now.
translation.es: Me quedaré con la de arriba.

translation.en: Spy fashion!
We have all the time in the world!
translation.es: Tenemos todo el tiempo del mundo.

translation.en: Patty! It's a spy- suit generator.
translation.es: ¡Patty! Un generador de trajes de espía.

translation.en: I'm gonna try it.
Maybe we should read the instructions first.
Tony!
Oh no. You're a pancake.
translation.es: No. Te convertiste en un panqueque.

translation.en: Let me try!
The world's coolest sister.
translation.es: La hermana más genial del mundo.

translation.en: Failure. Please try again.
Failure. Try again.
Super goop.
Sticks to anything once activated.
translation.es: Se adhiere a todo una vez activada.

translation.en: What is that thing?
It says it's a thought bubble.
Looks like you select an emotion
and, boom, your enemy is either laughing, crying, hungry…
translation.es: Seleccionas una emoción, ¡y bam! Tu enemigo ríe, llora, tiene hambre…

translation.en: Cute overload?  Gadgets are weird.
Ambush.
Almost good.
Wait a minute. I just remembered something.
Mom told me that there was something very important here,
translation.es: Mamá me dijo que había algo muy importante aquí,

translation.en: but that it would find me.
Aw! Look at you!
You're my favorite thing in the world now.
I'm gonna call you
Bronson.
How To Be A Spy, author unknown.
translation.es: Cómo ser un espía. Autor desconocido.

translation.en: A good spy is a master of deception?
translation.es: ¿Un buen espía es un maestro del engaño?

translation.en: All spying is based on lies? Really?
This book is awesome.
Mom and Dad's job is to lie and break the rules.
translation.es: El trabajo de mamá y papá es mentir.

translation.en: I don't care if it's their job. They tell us to be honest, but they weren't with us.
translation.es: No me importa. Nosotros debemos ser sinceros, pero ellos mienten.

translation.en: It proves that telling the truth only gets you in trouble.
translation.es: Demuestra que decir la verdad te causa problemas.

translation.en: That's crazy. Telling the truth should never be a bad thing.
translation.es: Es una locura. Eso no debería ser algo malo.

translation.en: Oh yeah? Look here.
A good spy never tells the truth.
translation.es: Un buen espía nunca dice la verdad.

translation.en: I'll never be a spy then.
Have fun with that.
I wish Mom and Dad were here now. Well, they're not. They're out spying.
translation.es: - Ojalá mamá y papá estuvieran aquí. - No lo están. Están espiando.

translation.en: - Tony, what if this was all our fault? - How?
translation.es: - ¿Y si todo fue culpa nuestra? - ¿Por qué?

translation.en: You downloaded Hyskor last night,
and then it was all over the news, taking over the world.
translation.es: Luego salió en las noticias y se apoderó del mundo.

translation.en: I guess that makes sense.
Since we caused this game apocalypse, then we should fix it.
translation.es: Si creamos el apocalipsis, debemos resolverlo.

translation.en: You mean take down the final boss? Like Rat Thickskull?
No, I'm saying that we save Mom and Dad
translation.es: No, salvamos a mamá y a papá

translation.en: so that they can stop the bad guys and save the world.
translation.es: y ellos detienen a los malos y salvan al mundo.

translation.en: That's the craziest idea I've ever heard.
translation.es: Es la idea más loca que escuché.

translation.en: So let's do it.
Children!
We're your parents' coworkers.
Mom said not to trust anyone.
- I say take 'em down. - What if they really are secret agents?
We can apologize later. Children?
You're our parents' coworkers?
- So you're spies? - Yes.
We are here to protect you.
Well, according to your manual, a good spy never tells the truth.
translation.es: Según su manual, un buen espía nunca dice la verdad.

translation.en: So we don't trust you.
We gotta go right now. You're not safe here.
translation.es: Debemos irnos. No están a salvo aquí.

translation.en: But it's a safe house.
That's it.
Careful.
They might have gadgets.
Here they come.
They could use some serious training.
Yup.
Spy training. - Stand here. - Ah!
Trap door! Failure.
Avoid the lasers or you'll trip the alarm.
translation.es: Evita los láseres o dispararás la alarma.

translation.en: Failure.
Sorry. Try again.
Thanks, Bronson. Now find us another exit.
Watch your step.
Try harder.
You two look… hungry.
Thanks, Bronson. Now let's get out of here before they eat the whole safe house.
translation.es: Gracias. Vámonos antes de que se coman todo el refugio.

translation.en: - Mine. - Boop.
Come on, Bronson! You're part of the team.
Too easy.
Yes!
Nice try, kids.
I'm Devlin, OSS division.
Your parents work for me. We don't believe you.
translation.es: - Soy el jefe de sus padres. - No te creemos.

translation.en: Trust me.
Oops.
- You're coming with us. - Huh? Oh.
We didn't know.
He has two pairs of sunglasses. He's definitely a spy.
translation.es: Tiene dos pares de anteojos. Sí es un espía.

translation.en: Hey! Watch the gadgets.
There are no video games in this truck.
translation.es: No hay videojuegos en esta camioneta.

translation.en: Oh, look, in case anyone ever wonders where all the spies are.
translation.es: Por si alguien se pregunta dónde están todos los espías.

translation.en: Everything is a mess. Half the world got hit by a game virus.
translation.es: Todo es un desastre. Un virus atacó a medio mundo.

translation.en: Some things are working. Some aren't. Yeah, we noticed.
translation.es: - Algunas cosas funcionan, otras no. - Sí, nos dimos cuenta.

translation.en: Cool spy boat.
That's actually a plane that's also a boat.
translation.es: Es un avión que también es un bote.

translation.en: It's complicated, kid.
It's one of our only vehicles that hasn't been locked down.
translation.es: Uno de los únicos vehículos que no se bloqueó.

translation.en: An OSS Super Ducky.
Why is it so small? Fits one adult. It's called secrecy.
translation.es: - Es muy pequeño. - Cabe un adulto. Se llama Secreto.

translation.en: And secrecy is how we protect the world from our enemies. Now, come on. We're in a hurry.
translation.es: Con así protegemos al mundo de nuestros enemigos. Vamos.

translation.en: Well, maybe we wouldn't have so many enemies if we weren't spying all the time.
translation.es: Quizá no tendríamos tantos enemigos si no espiáramos todo el tiempo.

translation.en: Nice dream, kid.
Our entire system's been locked up for the past 12 hours.
translation.es: Nuestro sistema está bloqueado hace 12 horas.

translation.en: We can't access anything at all. How do we find our parents?
translation.es: - Nada funciona. - ¿Cómo hallamos a nuestros padres?

translation.en: You got your vehicle working and escaped your house,
translation.es: Hicieron funcionar su vehículo y escaparon de su casa,

translation.en: so we think you two have what it takes to help.
translation.es: Hicieron funcionar su vehículo y escaparon de su casa, así que pueden ayudarnos.

translation.en: You want us to be real spies?
Don't get carried away.
I just want you to beat this video game so we can access our systems.
translation.es: Quiero que le ganes al videojuego para ingresar a los sistemas.

translation.en: Take off the kids' cuffs so they can do what they do best. Play games.
translation.es: Quítales las esposas para que hagan lo que saben: jugar.

translation.en: - But they're dangerous, sir. - Just… Off, please.
- I told you games would come in handy. - Okay. Get in there, kid.
translation.es: - Te dije que los juegos serían útiles. - Siéntate.

translation.en: We could never get past that part. Wow. That is great, kid.
translation.es: Nunca pudimos pasar esa parte. Eso es genial.

translation.en: That is… That's great.
I'll take over from here.
- I wouldn't do that. - Me neither.
I've played a few video games in my day.
You ever heard of GoldenEye? Watch this.
All right, just, uh…
get it done.
The system's back online. Yeah, that's good work, kid.
translation.es: El sistema está conectado. Bien hecho.

translation.en: All right. Now we can start searching for leads. Let's go, people. I wanna see some names.
translation.es: Bien. Empecemos a buscar pistas. Vamos. Quiero ver nombres.

translation.en: Mom told me there was something hidden at the safe house.
translation.es: Mamá me dijo que había algo oculto en el refugio.

translation.en: - Do you have something important, Bronson? -
The Armageddon Code.
But only a piece of it?
Oh. Your parents were smart to split the code.
This gives us a fighting chance.
What happens if the bad guy gets both pieces?
translation.es: ¿Y si el malo obtiene ambas partes?

translation.en: Your parents are only authorized to use that piece.
translation.es: Sus padres solo pueden usar esa.

translation.en: If the enemy combines them, he'd infect every device in the world with his game virus.
translation.es: Si el enemigo las combina, infectará cada dispositivo del mundo.

translation.en: He'd be king of the planet.
The King.
Devlin, we might know who your bad guy is.
translation.es: Devlin, sabemos quién es el malo.

translation.en: Who?
Unauthorized access. Oh!
- - Here it is.
Rey Kingston. But everyone knows him as the King.
translation.es: Rey Kingston. Pero todos lo llaman el Rey.

translation.en: Someone broke into our parents' system and stole Armageddon.
translation.es: Alguien entró a nuestro sistema y robó el código.

translation.en: It could only have been the King.
translation.es: Solo pudo haber sido el Rey.

translation.en: His new game, Hyskor, is what you're seeing on every device across the world.
translation.es: Su nuevo juego, Hyskor, es lo que ven en todos los dispositivos del mundo.

translation.en: The FBI already raided his game studio this morning,
translation.es: El FBI allanó su estudio esta mañana.

translation.en: but it was empty, and this King was nowhere to be found.
translation.es: Estaba vacío, y el Rey no estaba por ningún lado.

translation.en: Well, in his games, he always hides the bad guy in a cool, secret lair.
translation.es: En sus juegos, siempre esconde al malo en una guarida secreta.

translation.en: People, how do we find him? I want suggestions.
Well, my mom gave me this to track us.
translation.es: Mi mamá me dio esto para rastrearnos.

translation.en: So maybe we reverse- track her tracker?
translation.es: ¿Lo invertimos y la rastreamos a ella?

translation.en: That must be where your parents are located.
And quite possibly the King.
translation.es: Y muy posiblemente también el Rey.

translation.en: - Somebody else is in control. - It means the bad guys are gonna break in.
translation.es: - Otro tiene el control. - Los malos van a entrar.

translation.en: From there, there, and there.
translation.es: Por ahí, por ahí y por ahí.

translation.en: - What? - Trust me.
- We've learned from experience. - Know how much money I pay for security?
translation.es: - Ya nos pasó. - Pago fortunas por seguridad.

translation.en: There's one!
Get Armageddon out of here!
Protect the code!
Mom told us that we have to keep this safe until she finds us.
translation.es: Debemos proteger esto hasta que mamá nos encuentre.

translation.en: Lasers.
Ambush.
Go!
- Whoa! Did you see that? - See what happens if you kick 'em.
It did it again.
Give me that! Let the grown- ups handle this.
Give me the code.
They're getting away!
- We need to find out where they're going. - Bronson, we need eyes on the Heck Knight.
translation.es: - Hay que averiguar adónde van. - Bronson, debemos vigilar al Guerrero.

translation.en: Devlin! Get up and go chase them! You…
The bad guys are escaping on the lake.
translation.es: Los malos se escapan por el lago.

translation.en: We'll never catch them.
You can do the driving.
But only OSS agents know how to drive this.
translation.es: Pero solo los agentes de la OSS saben manejar esto.

translation.en: - - Thanks, Bronson!
I just remembered I get seasick.
They're getting away!
Our boat can't swim.
Yeah, well, their boats can't fly.
translation.es: Sí. Pero sus botes no vuelan.

translation.en: Bronson, airborne mode.
Bronson, here's the location we got from the necklace.
translation.es: Bronson, esta es la ubicación del collar.

translation.en: Fly us there.
Then we can get the code and save Mom and Dad.
translation.es: Obtendremos el código y salvaremos a mamá y papá.

translation.en: Why are you still reading that book?
These are the cheat codes to life.
You shouldn't cheat the King. It'll backfire on you.
translation.es: No debes engañar al rey. Será contraproducente.

translation.en: Be smart and play fair.
- Doesn't work. - How can you say that?
Remember when we snuck into Dad's office and found that puzzle he was working on?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas cuando encontramos el rompecabezas de papá?

translation.en: Uh- huh. The one that was really tricky to finish.
translation.es: Sí. El que era difícil de completar.

translation.en: When I solved it for him, I thought he'd be happy,
translation.es: Cuando lo resolví, pensé que se alegraría,

translation.en: but he got mad at me for sneaking into his work, saying I was dishonest.
translation.es: pero se enojó porque me metí con su trabajo.

translation.en: Yeah. Then he put up the tech restrictions on all our stuff.
translation.es: Sí. Luego puso las restricciones en nuestras cosas.

translation.en: See? Telling the truth only got me in trouble.
translation.es: ¿Lo ves? Decir la verdad me metió en problemas.

translation.en: Maybe at first.
But in the end, honesty always wins.
translation.es: Pero al final, la sinceridad siempre gana.

translation.en: King's lair up ahead!
- We're not slowing down. - Bronson, what's wrong?
We're gonna crash into that wall!
- That wall isn't really there. - Oh.
Polygon- based architecture.
Just like in old video games.
This guy is living the dream.
No way.
This whole place is covered in some sort of AR overlay.
translation.es: Todo está cubierto con realidad aumentada.

translation.en: AR? That hologram stuff that makes things look different than they are?
translation.es: ¿Qué? ¿Ese holograma que hace que todo se vea diferente?

translation.en: Yeah, that stuff.
Maybe these glasses can help us find Mom and Dad.
translation.es: Quizá hallemos a mamá y a papá con estos anteojos.

translation.en: Don't take a nap.
We have to keep trying or stop the code so we can get back to the kids.
translation.es: Debemos detener el código para volver con los niños.

translation.en: Even if we can escape, I don't think I can stop this.
But you made the code. Can't you unmake it?
translation.es: Tú creaste el código. ¿No puedes cancelarlo?

translation.en: Yes and no.
Operation Fireball?
Of course. We had to take down that villain Vargos.
We were supposed to destroy his lair and everything in it, but I found plans for this weapon.
translation.es: Debíamos destruir su guarida por completo, pero encontré los planos de un arma.

translation.en: Plans for the Armageddon Code?
I… I brought the plans back home so I could finish building the code, but I…
translation.es: Llevé los planos a casa para poder terminar de crear el código,

translation.en: I couldn't figure it out. I failed.
- How did you finish it? - I didn't.
Tony did.
He doesn't even really know it, but he did.
translation.es: Ni siquiera lo sabe, pero lo hizo.

translation.en: - How is that possible? - He got into my work somehow.
He knew the plans better than I did.
translation.es: Conocía los planos mejor que yo.

translation.en: He finished what I started, and I built Armageddon on top of what he gave me.
translation.es: Terminó lo que yo empecé, y creé Armagedón con lo que me dio.

translation.en: I could've told him everything, but I scolded him
translation.es: Podría habérselo dicho. Pero puse restricciones para proteger el código.

translation.en: and put tech restrictions up to protect the code.
translation.es: Pero puse restricciones para proteger el código.

translation.en: The kids don't even know that's why everything they love is being kept from them.
translation.es: Los niños no saben que por eso les quitamos lo que aman.

translation.en: And this is all my fault.
That is quite a story.
I knew you were hiding something from me.
But it doesn't matter who made what.
translation.es: Pero no importa quién hizo qué.

translation.en: I've taken the missing piece from your children,
translation.es: Les quité la parte que faltaba a tus hijos.

translation.en: and within minutes, the code will be ready to fire.
translation.es: En minutos, el código estará listo para funcionar.

translation.en: Your kids failed you.
Or maybe you failed them.
So Tony made the code.
translation.es: Así que Tony creó el código.

translation.en: Now no one in the world can stop me.
Tony! Tony made it!
There's a computer behind this panel.
translation.es: Hay una computadora tras este panel.

translation.en: Bronson, we need your help.
Now we can download a map of this place.
translation.es: Ahora podemos descargar un mapa de este lugar.

translation.en: Look. The prison cells are right by the King's VR pods
translation.es: Las celdas están junto las cápsulas de realidad virtual

translation.en: he showed on that video at school.
translation.es: que el Rey mostró en el video.

translation.en: I hear footsteps.
- Just don't look down. - I might've already looked down.
translation.es: No mires hacia abajo. Ya miré.

translation.en: Armageddon is close to being combined.
Then it will be unstoppable.
The King is already combining the code. We have to find Mom and Dad now.
translation.es: El Rey está combinando el código. Debemos hallar a mamá y papá.

translation.en: Those Hyskor characters are just AR overlays too.
translation.es: Los personajes de Hyskor son de realidad aumentada.

translation.en: They're actually robots.
Those robots aren't so scary.
translation.es: Esos robots no dan tanto miedo.

translation.en: - We need to jump. - What? Are you crazy?
- We need to jump. - No!
Those things are totally scary.
This way to the prison cells.
translation.es: Por aquí llegaremos a las celdas.

translation.en: - Is that… - Our kids.
- Patty! - Mom! Dad!
Oh, my babies!
Are you safe?
Stand back.
I'm setting my Magna Boots from pull to push.
translation.es: Pasaré las Magna botas de jalar a empujar.

translation.en: - Oh! - Well done! - Well done! - That's my girl. Oh!
I can't believe you found us. How… How did you even get here?
translation.es: No puedo creer que nos hayan encontrado. ¿Cómo llegaron aquí?

translation.en: Aw. Bronson flew us in the Super Ducky that we jacked from the OSS.
translation.es: Bronson nos trajo en el Superpatito que robamos de la OSS.

translation.en: - I am so proud… - That is… - …in this moment - …just beyond, my sweets.
Armageddon is combined. Launching in six minutes.
translation.es: Armagedón está combinado. Lanzamiento en seis minutos.

translation.en: What now, master spies? The clock's ticking.
Actually, I have a really solid plan inspired by our greatest mission.
translation.es: Tengo un plan muy bueno inspirado en nuestra mejor misión.

translation.en: - Operation Fireball. - You got it.
What was this Operation Fireball exactly?
translation.es: ¿Qué fue la Operación Bola de Fuego?

translation.en: Our mission was to infiltrate the operation of an evil man named Vargos.
translation.es: Debíamos infiltrarnos en la operación de un hombre malvado llamado Vargos.

translation.en: And we were able to infiltrate his lair by knocking on the door.
translation.es: Nos infiltramos en su guarida… llamando a la puerta.

translation.en: You just knocked on his door?
- With a truck. - Big truck.
We used our gadgets to get past the guards.
translation.es: Vencimos a los guardias con nuestros dispositivos.

translation.en: Friendly gadgets?
I went to stop the superweapon while your mother negotiated with Vargos. Mm- hmm.
translation.es: Fui a detener la superarma mientras su madre negociaba con Vargos.

translation.en: Negotiate? You mean beat up, don't you?
That sums it up. I couldn't stop the bomb in time.
translation.es: Eso lo resume. No pude detener la bomba.

translation.en: I had to stall just long enough…
translation.es: Así que tuve que hacer tiempo…

translation.en: So that we can set our own bomb off instead.
translation.es: …para poder hacer estallar nuestra propia bomba.

translation.en: We wiped out Vargos's operation in one glorious…
translation.es: Acabamos con la operación de Vargos en una gloriosa…

translation.en: Fireball.
- I love you. - I love you more.
Awesome.
Not awesome! You could've found a better way.
translation.es: ¡No es genial! Podrían haber encontrado un modo mejor.

translation.en: I'd… Hmm? How?
You could've asked nicely to see Mr. Vargos.
translation.es: Podrían haber pedido amablemente ver al Sr. Vargos.

translation.en: You could've used a thought bubble to keep the guards entertained.
translation.es: O usado una burbuja de pensamiento para entretener a los guardias.

translation.en: You could've gotten an understanding of his interior- design sense.
translation.es: Podrían haber entendido su sentido del diseño de interiores.

translation.en: You could've intervened in his plan with a softer touch.
translation.es: Podrían haber intervenido en su plan más suavemente.

translation.en: I guess we… could've considered that.
So that maybe instead of Operation Fireball,
translation.es: Quizá en lugar de la Operación Bola de Fuego,

translation.en: it could be Operation Peace and Harmony.
translation.es: podría ser la Operación Paz y Armonía.

translation.en: - That's my child. - Yeah. Yeah. Certainly not mine.
translation.es: - Esa es mi hija. - Sí. Y mía no es.

translation.en: - Armageddon in four minutes. - We have four minutes left.
translation.es: - Armagedón en cuatro minutos. - Quedan cuatro minutos.

translation.en: I could come up with a fantastic plan if I had a map of this place.
translation.es: Se me ocurriría un plan si tuviera un mapa de este lugar.

translation.en: - Boop. - Yes! Well done.
We have to get to these computer terminals to stall for time.
translation.es: Debemos llegar a estas computadoras para ganar tiempo.

translation.en: Let's go.
- That's the whole plan? - Yup.
translation.es: - Vamos. - ¿Ese es el plan? Ganaremos tiempo para pedir ayuda a la OSS.

translation.en: We're gonna buy some time to send a signal to OSS for help.
translation.es: Ganaremos tiempo para pedir ayuda a la OSS.

translation.en: - We stall when we can beat the King? - Armageddon is being armed.
translation.es: Pero podríamos vencer al Rey. Armagedón se prepara. Solo podemos ralentizarlo.

translation.en: Nothing we can do now except slow down its final process. Let's split up.
translation.es: Armagedón se prepara. Solo podemos ralentizarlo. Separémonos. Tony conmigo. Patty contigo.

translation.en: - I'll take Tony. You take Patty. - They have Magna Boots.
translation.es: Separémonos. Tony conmigo. Patty contigo. Tienen Magna botas. Pueden llegar a la bifurcación.

translation.en: - They can access the branching path. - No, no, no, no.
translation.es: Tienen Magna botas. Pueden llegar a la bifurcación. - Es demasiado peligroso. - Tienes razón. Vengan.

translation.en: - It's too dangerous for them. - You're right. Come here a second.
translation.es: - Es demasiado peligroso. - Tienes razón. Vengan.

translation.en: We can do this.
Yeah.
- Okay. Hey, you two stick together, okay? - Okay.
- And stick to the plan. - Got it.
We love you too!
- I immediately regret this. - So much.
- Yeah. We should go. - Yep.
- I need eyes in the hall. - On it.
Tony, we gotta hurry!
I'm trying to beat Hyskor to stall for time.
translation.es: Intento vencer a Hyskor para ganar tiempo.

translation.en: You lost.
- I've got a new plan. - What new plan?
If we get to this elevator, we can stop the countdown.
translation.es: Desde el ascensor, detendremos la cuenta regresiva.

translation.en: That's not what they told us to do. We have to stick to the plan.
translation.es: No es lo que nos dijeron. Debemos seguir con el plan.

translation.en: We have to do whatever it takes to win.
I think you were right, Patty.
About what?
We're not gonna make it.
That must be the central computer. I can use it to stop Armageddon.
translation.es: Debe ser la computadora central. La usaré para detener a Armagedón.

translation.en: Wait a minute.
I know this.
I made this.
You made the Armageddon Code?
Sort of. It was that weird puzzle from Dad's work, but it wasn't a puzzle.
translation.es: Era el rompecabezas raro de papá. Pero no era rompecabezas.

translation.en: - It was the plans for Armageddon Code. - How are you gonna stop it though?
translation.es: - Eran los planos para el código. - ¿Cómo lo detendrás?

translation.en: The same way I solved it. The last part of the plan had a trick to it,
translation.es: Como lo resolví. La última parte del plano tenía un truco.

translation.en: where you couldn't tell if it was completed
translation.es: No sabías si estaba completo o no

translation.en: because you had to do the same steps backwards.
translation.es: porque debías hacer los mismos pasos al revés.

translation.en: That's how I'm going to break it.
Okay. What do I do?
- Press that button. - Which one?
- We're out of time! - Almost there.
You couldn't tell if the code was completed or not.
translation.es: No sabías si el código estaba completo o no.

translation.en: Tony, wait! Stop! It's a trick!
You have armed Armageddon.
What?
I just stopped it.
Wrong, Tony.
You've put it together for me.
- Mom! Dad! - Oh, the whole family!
You weren't able to complete the code yourself, were you? Even after you got the missing piece.
translation.es: No pudiste completar el código ni siquiera con la parte faltante.

translation.en: Only the true code creator can activate the world- conquering potential.
translation.es: Solo el verdadero creador puede activar el potencial de conquista.

translation.en: I made this fake countdown so you, Tony, could combine it for me.
translation.es: Hice una cuenta regresiva falsa para que Tony pudiera combinarlo.

translation.en: Thank you.
We downloaded Hyskor last night and caused all of this.
translation.es: Descargamos Hyskor anoche y causamos todo esto.

translation.en: No, no, no. You just wanted to play a game.
translation.es: No. Solo querían jugar un juego.

translation.en: You didn't cause this.
They did.
And so did the rest of the world.
translation.es: Y también el resto del mundo.

translation.en: Vargos was my father.
From Operation Fireball?
He was a genius that used his technology to make our home country a better place.
translation.es: Era un genio que usó su tecnología para hacer de nuestro país un lugar mejor.

translation.en: Sure, his head wasn't always in the right spot,
translation.es: No siempre tomaba las decisiones correctas,

translation.en: but someone could have helped guide him.
But you OSS agents laid waste to everything,
translation.es: Pero ustedes, los agentes de la OSS, arrasaron con todo

translation.en: stole Armageddon as a weapon for yourselves.
translation.es: y robaron Armagedón para usarlo como su propia arma.

translation.en: He would've improved the world with his creation.
translation.es: Él habría mejorado el mundo con su creación.

translation.en: But instead, my father spent the last days of his life
translation.es: Sin embargo, mi padre pasó sus últimos días

translation.en: in some top secret prison.
I never saw him again.
I'm so sorry, but we can't let you do this.
The only way to make this world better is by force,
translation.es: La única forma de mejorar este mundo es por la fuerza.

translation.en: and my father's creation will do just that.
translation.es: La creación de mi padre hará eso.

translation.en: Armageddon Code, select target.
The world.
This entire broken planet will be fixed by Hyskor,
translation.es: Hyskor arreglará todo este planeta roto.

translation.en: a game that makes you a better person as you play.
translation.es: Un juego que te hace ser mejor persona a medida que juegas.

translation.en: Because I'm in control.
Enjoy your life
of play.
No.
We did this all wrong.
Yeah, we did.
I'm sorry I wasn't a good spy like you wanted me to be.
translation.es: Lamento no haber sido una buena espía como querían.

translation.en: No. I'm sorry, Patty.
With your honest heart, you are better than I will ever be.
translation.es: Con tu corazón sincero, eres mejor de lo que yo seré.

translation.en: And you are so much more than I could have hoped for.
translation.es: Y eres mucho más de lo que podría haber deseado.

translation.en: I wanted to win, Dad, but I ended the world.
translation.es: Quería ganar. Pero acabé con el mundo.

translation.en: No. No, you didn't, pal. You didn't. I did.
translation.es: Claro que no, amiguito. Fui yo.

translation.en: When you brought me the code, and I didn't tell you the truth.
translation.es: Cuando me trajiste el código y no te dije la verdad.

translation.en: I'm so, so, so, so sorry.
Hey. How about you two show us how to play this Hyskor game, huh?
translation.es: Oigan. ¿Por qué no nos enseñan a jugar a Hyskor?

translation.en: We got nothing else to do now that the world as we know it is over.
translation.es: No tenemos nada más que hacer. El mundo se acabó.

translation.en: Wait. There might still be a way we can win this.
translation.es: Esperen. Quizá haya una manera de ganar.

translation.en: - Oh… - But we can't stop the King anymore.
translation.es: Ya no podemos detener al Rey.

translation.en: Well, not physically, obviously, but we can stop him virtually, can't we?
translation.es: Bueno, no físicamente. Pero sí virtualmente, ¿no?

translation.en: Look. The King is using this VR pod to control Armageddon.
translation.es: El Rey usa la cápsula de realidad virtual para controlar Armagedón.

translation.en: He is inside the game.
But if we use these VR pods,
translation.es: Si usamos estas cápsulas de realidad virtual,

translation.en: then we can beat him the same way you beat Hyskor.
translation.es: podemos vencerlo como venciste a Hyskor.

translation.en: Reach the end of the world, defeat the last player standing, win the crown.
translation.es: Vence al último jugador en pie para ganar la corona.

translation.en: - Yeah. - This sounds crazy.
It is crazy.
Yeah.
So let's do it.
I… I… I…
- That's your child. - Wait.
- Back. Patty, come here! - Patty!
Cute overload.
They're not so bad. They're just cute little beep- boops.
translation.es: No son tan malos. Son robotitos lindos.

translation.en: Can you help us play against the King in Hyskor?
translation.es: ¿Nos ayudan a jugar contra el Rey en Hyskor?

translation.en: You're right, Patty. He's controlling Armageddon from inside the game.
translation.es: Tienes razón, Patty. Controla a Armagedón desde el juego.

translation.en: But if we beat him before he locks us out, we can save the world.
translation.es: Si lo vencemos antes de que nos bloquee, salvamos al mundo.

translation.en: Here's my plan.
We go in, but no cheats, no tricks, no rat skills.
translation.es: Entramos, pero sin trampas, sin trucos, sin engaños.

translation.en: - We play fair together. - Wait, we go into the video game?
- Yeah. - I think we need to regroup.
- There's no time. - We should call the OSS agents.
translation.es: - Pensémoslo mejor. - No hay tiempo. Llamemos a la OSS y resolvamos esto como espías.

translation.en: Figure this out the spy way.
translation.es: Llamemos a la OSS y resolvamos esto como espías.

translation.en: I'm not following the spy playbook anymore.
translation.es: Ya no seguiré el libro de espías.

translation.en: Patty's been right all this time. I trust her.
translation.es: Patty tenía razón. Confío en ella.

translation.en: - Then let's play. - Let's go.
Dad, you know how you always tell us video games will fry our brain?
translation.es: Papá, siempre dices que los videojuegos nos freirán el cerebro.

translation.en: - Yeah. - If we lose…
- This game might actually fry our brains. - Yeah.
translation.es: - Este juego sí nos freirá el cerebro. - Sí.

translation.en: - Wait, what'd they say? - It's… She didn't…
- We're gonna have fun. Let's have fun. - Okay.
We're trapped!
No, Dad. It's an elevator. The game's about to start.
translation.es: No. En un ascensor. El juego está por empezar.

translation.en: Tony, you're playing as Rat Thickskull!
- And you're playing as Florella! - Wait, what are these outfits?
translation.es: - Y tú eres Florella. - ¿Qué son estos atuendos?

translation.en: The game made you play as a character called Tayanna.
translation.es: El juego te hizo jugar como Tayanna.

translation.en: And the game made you play as a character called Itza.
translation.es: Y a ti como un personaje llamado Itza.

translation.en: Got it.
Here we are.
Where are we?
We're at the end of the world. The finale of the world's most challenging game.
translation.es: En el fin del mundo. El final del juego más difícil del mundo.

translation.en: The ground is cracking. We have to go now!
- All right. - This game is not fun.
Step one,
we have to get to that giant statue to find the King.
translation.es: Debemos llegar a esa estatua para hallar al Rey.

translation.en: - Are you sure this is right? - Just keep up!
I'm working on it!
And there goes my back.
Now we have to fight a few bad guys to get to the statue.
translation.es: Ahora, a luchar contra algunos malos.

translation.en: And with only nine minutes left.
translation.es: Y solo nos quedan nueve minutos.

translation.en: Wait. Why are there so many of them?
It's a game.
It's more fun that way.
If we fall, we lose.
If we don't work as a team, we lose.
translation.es: Si no trabajamos en equipo, perdemos.

translation.en: How do we not lose?
Just think of this as an ambush.
Goody.
How about a skeleton?
Two skeletons!
Use your bracelet. It's like a spy gadget.
translation.es: Usa la pulsera. Es como un dispositivo de espionaje.

translation.en: - See? - Whoa.
- Use your hammer to hit, Dad! - Oh!
Your dad's pretty cool, huh?
Is that a flaming skull?  Get lost! You too.
translation.es: - ¿Una calavera en llamas? - Vete. Tú también.

translation.en: Flaming skulls!
Go, Mom!
Thank you, Mom.
I'll always have your back. - Duck! - Whoa!
I upgraded.
Look at you.
Florella gets stronger as you work through the game.
translation.es: Florella se fortalece al avanzar en el juego.

translation.en: She sure does.
So is that it? Did we win?
No. It's time for step two. We have to beat the last player standing.
translation.es: No. Es hora del segundo paso: vencer al último jugador en pie.

translation.en: The King.
But only one of us can go in to face him.
translation.es: Pero solo uno puede ir a enfrentarlo.

translation.en: The rest of us have to defeat his champion, the Heck Knight.
translation.es: Los demás debemos derrotar a su campeón, el Guerrero.

translation.en: You're our best player, Tony. You're the only one
translation.es: Eres el mejor jugador, Tony. Puedes vencer al Rey sin perder tu salud.

translation.en: who can beat the King without losing all your health.
translation.es: Puedes vencer al Rey sin perder tu salud.

translation.en: What? We have health? Yeah. Yours is low, Dad. Real low.
translation.es: - ¿Tenemos salud? - Sí, la tuya está muy baja, papá.

translation.en: - Oh. I thought I was just losing weight. - No. Come on!
translation.es: Creí que había perdido peso. - No. Vamos. - Bien.

translation.en: Wait.
I don't know if I can win this without my tricks or cheats.
translation.es: No sé si podré ganar sin trucos o trampas.

translation.en: What if I lose?
Worth it.
Now, while everyone plays Hyskor,
I can improve the world.
Deleting all nuclear launch codes.
translation.es: Borrar todos los códigos de lanzamiento nuclear.

translation.en: No need for that in my world.
And…
Hello.
Another player ready to cheat.
I've been watching your every move from this throne,
translation.es: Observé tus movimientos desde este trono.

translation.en: and as I have designed my games from here, now I'm designing Earth.
translation.es: Diseñé mis juegos desde aquí. Ahora diseño la Tierra.

translation.en: You are so impressive.
I don't think I could even stop you kids out there in the real world.
translation.es: No creo que pueda detenerlos en el mundo real.

translation.en: But… in here,
I can never lose.
If you lower my health to zero, you win.
translation.es: Si bajas mi salud a cero, ganas.

translation.en: But if I lower yours…
game over.
Careful, Tony. The staff is Rat Thickskull's worst weapon.
translation.es: Cuidado. El bastón es la peor arma de Rat Thickskull.

translation.en: Well,
it's a good thing I'm not Rat Thickskull.
translation.es: Menos mal que no soy Rat Thickskull.

translation.en: Because Rat's not good at a lot of things.
translation.es: Porque Rat no sabe hacer muchas cosas.

translation.en: He's a scoundrel.
He does anything to win.
translation.es: Hace lo que sea para ganar.

translation.en: And that's why today,
I'm playing as myself.
Shall we?
First of all, the King?
Really?
If you can create your own world, why not make yourself the king?
translation.es: Si puedes crear tu propio mundo, ¿por qué no ser el rey?

translation.en: You'll become the court jester when I'm done with you.
translation.es: Serás el bufón cuando termine contigo.

translation.en: I cannot be defeated.
Well, remember me?
Yeah. I didn't have this big ol' fist then, did I?
translation.es: Antes no tenía este puño grande.

translation.en: Catch me…
Oh, baby.
Nice catch. But I love you.
- We have to beat that Heck Knight. - Honey.
Let's do Operation Fireball, but not our way.
translation.es: Hagamos Bola de Fuego, pero no a nuestro modo.

translation.en: Patty's way.
- You have been such a great challenge. - We appreciate you.
translation.es: - Fuiste un gran desafío. - Te valoramos.

translation.en: - Keep up the good work. - You're golden.
Stay back! Don't come over here!
- The ground is unstable. You'll fall. - Why would I trust you?
translation.es: - El suelo es inestable. Te caerás. - ¿Por qué confiaría en ti?

translation.en: Because you can.
You did it. You found a better way.
translation.es: Lo lograron. Hallaron un modo mejor.

translation.en: You saved the Heck Knight.
Florella,
henceforth, I will follow you,
translation.es: De ahora en adelante, te seguiré,

translation.en: for your integrity is pure.
We did our part, but we're running out of time.
translation.es: Lo logramos, pero se acaba el tiempo.

translation.en: Tony has to win. Now.
- Whoo! - Yes, Tony!
- No! - What?!
Come on, Rat.
Use your tricks and cheats.
Tony's in trouble. Dad, don't.
I have to help him.
Your father's breaking the rules!
Dad!
- No, Dad. I have to do this myself. -
No… cheating.
But I played fair.
It doesn't matter.
- No! - Oh no! No, no!
Victory is mine!
I never thought anyone would ever earn that.
- The One Hit. - What?
Tony just received the legendary One Hit, the mythical ability hidden within the game.
translation.es: Tony recibió el mítico Golpe Único, la habilidad oculta en el juego.

translation.en: How did you…
Maybe because I played the game like my sister said.
translation.es: Porque jugué como me dijo mi hermana.

translation.en: I believe her now.
No. No. No!
- Yeah! - Yay!
You lost.
You won fair and square, but I can't let you stop Armageddon.
translation.es: Fue una victoria justa, pero no pararás a Armagedón.

translation.en: It's the only way to fix this world.
translation.es: Es el único modo de arreglar el mundo.

translation.en: You could have removed the One Hit from the game, but you didn't.
translation.es: Podrías haber quitado el Golpe Único, pero no lo hiciste.

translation.en: Yes, but I stopped trusting this world to make itself a better place.
translation.es: Sí, pero dejé de confiar en que el mundo se convertiría en lugar mejor.

translation.en: The only way to do it is by force.
translation.es: Solo puede hacerse por la fuerza.

translation.en: Your games never forced me to play fair.
translation.es: Tus juegos nunca me obligaron a jugar limpio.

translation.en: My sister inspired me to.
So now we just have to inspire the world to be better.
translation.es: Solo debemos inspirar al mundo a ser mejor.

translation.en: You know, instead of forcing everyone to be gamers like us.
translation.es: En lugar de obligar a todos a ser jugadores como nosotros.

translation.en: Like us.
It's true.
You and your sister have shown that maybe we do have the power to inspire them.
translation.es: Tú y tu hermana demostraron que quizá sí podemos inspirarlos.

translation.en: He's running out of time!
Shut down Armageddon.
Yes.
Okay.
Yes! Yes, Tony!
I knew you could do it.
Tremendous effort.
Well done.
Tony.

On page two of How To Be a Spy,

that makes us the high- level agents.

What should have been done for your father we're going to do for you.
